title: About Us
content:
About Groow

Welcome to Groow, your premier destination for quality products from trusted vendors. We connect buyers with the best sellers in the marketplace.

Our Mission

To provide a seamless shopping experience that brings together quality products and exceptional service.
metaDescription: Learn about Groow's mission to connect buyers with quality vendors

title: Terms of Service
content:
Terms of Service

Last updated: November 6, 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Groow marketplace, you accept and agree to be bound by these terms.
metaDescription: Read Groow's terms of service and conditions

title: Privacy Policy
content:
Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect and use your data.

Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us when using our services.
metaDescription: Groow's privacy policy and data protection practices

title: Shipping & Delivery
content:
Shipping & Delivery

Fast and reliable shipping on all orders.

Delivery Times

  • Standard: 5-7 business days
  • Express: 2-3 business days
  • Next Day: Order before 2 PM
metaDescription: Learn about our shipping options and delivery times

title: Return Policy
content:
Return Policy

30-day hassle-free returns on all products.

How to Return

  1. Contact customer support
  2. Ship item back with provided label
  3. Receive refund within 5-7 days
metaDescription: Easy returns within 30 days of purchase
